title: Collaborative Learning Process for Domotics Design Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic programming comprehension and general familiarity with home automation systems
context.additional_context: Large-scale remote classroom environments utilizing real-time video conferencing tools and cloud-based simulation platforms

learning_goals: Learners can identify the basic components of a domotics system and explain their functions.
Learners can collaborate on designing home automation scenarios using simulation tools.
Learners can improve design prototypes through real-time collaboration with peers during problem-solving processes.

resources: Cloud-Based Simulation Tool (Similar to DomoSim-TPC System)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
